snippet.title: Blood In Baldur's Gate - Intro
snippet.description:
15 years before the events of Baldur's Gate 3, the streets of the city ran red with blood.

Tavs, we need your help. Will your sharp analytical minds unravel these heinous killings before the murderer strikes again?

http://bloodinbaldursgate.com

---

For more, all you need is Baldur's Gate 3: https://baldursgate3.game/
Baldur's Gate 3 launches August 31st on PC, Mac, PS5, and Nvidia GeForce NOW. 

Preordering on PC now will automatically upgrade you to the Digital Edition for free. On PS5, preordering the Deluxe Edition will give you access to 72hrs Early Access and many other goodies. 

Pre-order the Deluxe Edition or Collector's Edition here: https://larian.club/ya_GetBG3Now

Follow us on social media: 
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/larianstudios
